Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
Looks like the bulk of these decorations are
green...and since green is my favorite color, I
couldn't be happier! Yaaaaay green!

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
There's a heavy blue tone to this decor...and
that's fine by me, because blue looks cool!

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
I got a sudden chill and was wondering why,
but...it's because of the decor, isn't it? Kind of
amazing how much influence it can have!

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
For some reason, the decor here makes me feel
like I'm wandering the desert or something. I
NEED WATER, FRIENDLY CACTUS MAN. Haha...

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
Whoa, look at it sparkle!
<PAGE>
I bet it's made of expensive stuff, huh? I really
wanna try sitting down on it!

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
Th-this pot seems super expensive. I'll have to
be real careful not to break it...but man, it looks
like I could break it with a thought!

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
Most people where I'm from use wooden
columns when building their homes...
<PAGE>
But I prefer stone columns, because they look
way more majestic!

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
Erm, what...does this say?

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
Woooooo! This makes me want to jump up in
the air and swing my arms around like I just
don't care! I feel like a little boy again!

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
Do you know how fire extinguishers work?
<PAGE>
I hear the liquid might get kinda frozen in winter.
And then if there's a fire, you're pretty much out
of luck!
<PAGE>
That totally makes sense, too. And is kind of
scary, because having a working fire
extinguisher is really, really important!

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
Wh-what is this thing? An "obelisk"?
<PAGE>
...I really don't know much about ancient
civilizations...

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
Wow, it's beautiful! I'd love to bring this back
home for my girlfriend...

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
Dunno why, exactly, but I'd love to have a house
with a garden full of flowers like these...

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
I'm a carpenter, so...every time I look at
something made of stone, I feel a pang of
solidarity in my heart. I hear you, stone brother!

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
I came here to buy material stone, but there
wasn't enough of it to go 'round. The foreman's
not gonna like that!

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
Okay, I got all the material stone I needed! Next
visit will be all about lumber.

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
I got some great material stone thanks to the
high-quality production in this town. My
foreman won't be able to yell at me this time!

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
All right, I got the highest grade lumber money
can buy! That grumpy ol' foreman might even
sing my praises for this...

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
Hey, uh, can you tell me where they sell lumber
around here?

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
I buy my materials in bulk, and I'm always
hoping for some kinda discount. But the world
just isn't that fair...

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
I'm training to be a carpenter, and my foreman
sent me here today to buy materials.

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
I'm a repeat customer at the Carpenter's shop in
this town. The owner knows me by name.

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
Since the material stone sold here is high-quality
stuff, I usually make a point of coming here to
buy it.

<NAME_MOB_PORUTOSU>
I can buy almost any material I need right here in
this town. It's ridiculously convenient!
